tool_description: Language And Profanity Detection as a Service
title: Linguin AI

api_list.name: Detect Language
api_list.description: Use this endpoint to detect the language(s) of a single text.

api_list.name: Languages
api_list.description: Get the list of supported languages
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://linguin-ai.p.rapidapi.com/languages"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "linguin-ai.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Detect profanity
api_list.description: Use this endpoint to detect the profanity level of a single text.

api_list.name: Detect Language
api_list.description: Use this endpoint to detect the language(s) of a single text.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://linguin-ai.p.rapidapi.com/detect/language"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "linguin-ai.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
